Log:
------------------------- Release 1.3.0.1 --------------------- +++++++++++++++++ MAJOR UPDATE! Canon DSLR Support! +++++++++++
+ Canon DSLR cameras support (currently on testing, but works quite good) + DSLR Iso\Shutter\Aperture\WhiteBalance control from app + DSLR movie recording (also with chromakey function) + DSLR photo capture (also with chromakey function) + DSLR chromakey LiveView on photo & video + Separate chromakey settings for photo & video + Separate backgrounds & overlay for photo & video chromakey + Add Bletooth LE white LED light control for updated MixUp booth + Improved app stability + Fixed some freaky bugs ;)
